agents.list: List available local and remote agents
auth.login: Login or change the auth method
auth.logout: Log out and clear all cached credentials
chat.save: Save the current conversation as a checkpoint. Usage: /chat save <tag>
chat.resume: Resume a conversation from a checkpoint. Usage: /chat resume <tag>
chat.delete: Delete a conversation checkpoint. Usage: /chat delete <tag>
chat.share: Share the current conversation to a markdown or json file. Usage: /chat share <file>
chat.debug: Export the most recent API request as a JSON payload
clear: Clear the screen and conversation history
compress: Compresses the context by replacing it with a summary
copy: Copy the last result or code snippet to clipboard
directory.add: Add directories to the workspace. Use comma to separate multiple paths
directory.show: Show all directories in the workspace
docs: Open full Gemini CLI documentation in your browser
extensions.install: Install an extension from a git repo or local path
extensions.link: Link an extension from a local path
extensions.explore: Open extensions page in your browser
hooks.panel: Display all registered hooks with their status
init: Analyzes the project and creates a tailored GEMINI.md file
mcp: Manage configured Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers
mcp.auth: Authenticate with an OAuth-enabled MCP server
mcp.list: List configured MCP servers and tools
mcp.desc: List configured MCP servers and tools with descriptions
mcp.schema: List configured MCP servers and tools with descriptions and schemas
memory.refresh: Refresh the memory from the source
memory.list: Lists the paths of the GEMINI.md files in use
model: Opens a dialog to configure the model
permissions: Manage folder trust settings and other permissions
policies.list: List all active policies grouped by mode
restore: Restore a tool call. This will reset the conversation and file history to the state it was in when the tool call was suggested
rewind: Jump back to a specific message and restart the conversation
settings: View and edit Gemini CLI settings
skills: List, enable, disable, or reload Gemini CLI agent skills
skills.enable: Enable a disabled skill by name
skills.reload: Reload the list of discovered skills
terminal-setup: Configure terminal keybindings for multiline input

extensions.responses.noExtensions: No extensions installed. Run `/extensions explore` to check out the gallery.
extensions.responses.loaderNotReady: Extensions are not yet loaded, can't restart yet
extensions.responses.notFoundOrActive: Extension(s) not found or not active: {{names}}
extensions.responses.exploreTest: Would open extensions page in your browser: {{url}} (skipped in test environment)
extensions.responses.exploreOpening: Opening extensions page in your browser: {{url}}
extensions.responses.exploreFailed: Failed to open browser. Check out the extensions gallery at {{url}}
extensions.responses.unsupportedScope: Unsupported scope {{scope}}, should be one of "user", "workspace", or "session"
